    Query Q&A

    query_QA.Rmd

    Purpose

    This vignette presents the QA/QC of the query process.

    Libraries

    library(wateReview)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)

    Data loading

    We load the initial and final query and corpus databases.

    load(file = system.file("extdata", "language_dfs.rda", package = "wateReview"))
initial_meta_df <- get_meta_df(language_dfs)
load(file = system.file("extdata", "language_dfs_updated_3.rda", package = "wateReview"))
final_meta_df <- get_meta_df(language_dfs)
head(final_meta_df, 3) %>%
    knitr::kable(digits = 3, format = "html", caption = "") %>%
    kableExtra::kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("hover", "condensed")) %>%
    kableExtra::scroll_box(width = "7in")
    Cites Authors Title Year Source Publisher ArticleURL CitesURL GSRank QueryDate Type DOI ISSN CitationURL Volume Issue StartPage EndPage ECC CitesPerYear CitesPerAuthor AuthorCount Age language collected DOI_flag database source-app rec-number foreign-keys ref-type contributors titles periodical pages volume number dates publisher isbn notes urls electronic-resource-num pdfs

GERMINATION OF SCARIFIED SEEDS OF ARAUCARIA-ANGUSTIFOLIA IN SOILCiencia e Cultura (Sao Paulo) Ciencia e Cultura (Sao Paulo) 1583-1589 36 9 1984 NA NA Cited By (since 1984): 15 NA NA NA

    We use query_QA_plots() to produce all plots.

    initial <- query_QA_plots(initial_meta_df)
final <- query_QA_plots(final_meta_df)
